snippet: A collector of the classic color photographs of William Eggleston has sued the artist, charging that the value of the works is being diluted by Mr. Eggleston's recent decision to sell enlarged versions of some of his best-known images.
abstract: A collector of the classic color photographs of William Eggleston has sued the artist, charging that the value of the works is being diluted by Mr. Eggleston's recent decision to sell enlarged versions of some of his best-known images.

headline.main: Collector Sues William Eggleston Over New Prints of Old Photos
